item.title: 据彭博社报道，索尼考虑分拆芯片部门
item.description: 据彭博新闻社援引匿名消息来源报道，索尼正在考虑最快于今年将其半导体业务分拆上市。【原文：Sony is considering a spinoff and listing of its semiconductor business as soon as this year, Bloomberg News reported, citing anonymous sources.】

item.title: 特朗普吹捧英伟达、J&J、现代、丰田在美投资
item.description: 官员们告诉路透社记者，来自英伟达（Nvidia）、强生（Johnson & Johnson）、丰田汽车（Toyota Motor）、礼来（Eli Lilly）和软银集团（SoftBank Group）的首席执行官和其他高管将于周三访问白宫，这是一项强调美国投资的活动的一部分。【原文：CEOs and other executives from Nvidia , Johnson & Johnson , Toyota Motor , Eli Lilly and SoftBank Group are among the more than two-dozen senior business leaders slated to visit the White House on Wednesday as part of an event highlighting U.S. investments, officials told Reuters.】

item.title: 亚马逊发射首颗 Kuiper 互联网卫星，向 Starlink 发起挑战
item.description: 亚马逊 Kuiper 宽带互联网星座的首批 27 颗卫星于周一从佛罗里达州发射升空，拉开了拖延已久的太空互联网网络部署的序幕，该网络将与 SpaceX 的 Starlink 相媲美。【原文：The first 27 satellites for Amazon's Kuiper broadband internet constellation were launched into space from Florida on Monday, kicking off the long-delayed deployment of an internet-from-space network that will rival SpaceX's Starlink.】

item.title: 调查显示，新兴经济体在人工智能信任度方面遥遥领先
item.description: 墨尔本大学（University of Melbourne）和专业服务公司毕马威（KPMG）的一项重要调查发现，新兴经济体的人们比发达经济体的人们更愿意相信人工智能，而且对其带来的好处也更加乐观和兴奋。【原文：People in emerging economies are more willing to trust AI than those in advanced economies and are more optimistic and excited about its benefits, a major survey by the University of Melbourne and professional services firm KPMG has found.】

item.title: 特斯拉位于内华达州的 Semi 工厂将于 2025 年底生产出首批卡车
item.description: 特斯拉在关于 Semi 的最新消息中表示，首批电动卡车将于 2025 年底在内华达州的千兆工厂园区下线。【原文：Tesla , in an update on Semi, said that the first units of the electric trucks will be on the production line by the end of 2025 at its Nevada gigafactory campus.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 提议将美国的合法住所从特拉华州迁至得克萨斯州
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 董事会周一在 6 月 17 日股东大会前提交的一份文件中，呼吁其股东批准将其美国业务从特拉华州迁至得克萨斯州。【原文：Latin American e-commerce giant MercadoLibre's board called on its shareholders on Monday to approve a redomestication of its U.S. operations from Delaware to Texas, in a filing ahead of a June 17 shareholders meeting.】

item.title: 由于第一季度业绩强劲、需求稳定，拉丁美洲航空公司上调了核心盈利展望
item.description: 拉美航空周一上调了今年的核心盈利预期，理由是第一季度业绩强劲且需求稳定。【原文：LATAM Airlines on Monday hiked its estimated core earnings for the year, citing strong first-quarter results and stable demand.】

item.title: 标普将波音评级从 "信用观察 "负面名单中移除，原因是飞机生产改善
item.description: 全球评级机构 S&P 周一表示，由于波音公司的飞机产量不断提高，现金消耗减少，该机构已将波音公司的评级从 "负面信用观察"（CreditWatch）中移除。【原文：S&P has removed Boeing's rating from CreditWatch negative on improving aircraft production and lower cash burn, the global ratings agency said on Monday.】

item.title: 泰瑞达因芯片测试工具需求强劲，预计第二季度营收乐观
item.description: 泰瑞达（Teradyne）周一预计第二季度营收高于华尔街预期，季度利润和营收也超过预期，主要得益于半导体测试设备的稳定需求。【原文：Teradyne on Monday forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street expectations and beat estimates for quarterly profit and revenue, helped by steady demand for its semiconductor-testing equipment.】

item.title: 布朗公司因收费收入增加而利润上升
item.description: 保险经纪公司布朗布朗周一公布，受益于佣金和费用收入的增加，第一季度利润增长了 13%。【原文：Insurance brokerage Brown & Brown reported a 13% rise in first-quarter profit on Monday, benefiting from higher income from commissions and fees.】

item.title: 现货价格上涨，美国钢铁制造商纽柯季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 美国钢铁制造商纽柯公司（Nucor Corp）周一公布的第一季度营收和利润超出分析师预期，主要得益于钢厂业务的强劲增长。【原文：U.S. steelmaker Nucor Corp beat analysts' estimates for first-quarter revenue and profit on Monday, helped by strength in its mills segment operations.】

item.title: 云服务需求强劲，F5 预计第三季度营收高于预期
item.description: F5 公司周一预测第三季度营收高于华尔街预期，第二季度营收也超过预期，这表明市场对其云服务的需求不断增长，使其股价在延时交易中上涨了 1.8%。【原文：F5 forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates and beat second-quarter revenue estimates on Monday, indicating growing demand for its cloud services, sending its shares up 1.8% in extended trading.】

item.title: 李维斯股东投票反对终止多元化计划的提议
item.description: 李维-斯特劳斯公司（Levi Strauss）在周一提交的一份文件中披露，该公司股东投票反对公司终止多元化、公平和包容性（DEI）工作的提议。【原文：Levi Strauss shareholders voted against a proposal for the company to end its diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) efforts, it disclosed in a filing on Monday.】

item.title: 交易日：注意安全，山姆大叔
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: OpenAI 通过 ChatGPT 搜索更新推出新的购物功能
item.description: OpenAI 周一表示，它已经更新了 ChatGPT 的网络搜索功能，通过带有图片、评论和直接购买链接的个性化产品推荐来改善用户的在线购物体验。【原文：OpenAI on Monday said it has updated ChatGPT's web search capabilities to improve online shopping for users with personalized product recommendations with images, reviews, and direct purchase links.】

item.title: 辛辛那提金融公司因加州野火问题陷入季度亏损
item.description: 辛辛那提金融保险公司（Cincinnati Financial）周一出现第一季度亏损，原因是加州大火造成的灾难性损失以及投资收益减少影响了盈利。【原文：Insurance firm Cincinnati Financial swung to a first-quarter loss on Monday, as catastrophic losses from the California fires and a decrease in investment gains weighed on earnings.】

item.title: 恩智浦首席执行官今年退休，内部人士索托马约尔接任
item.description: 恩智浦半导体公司（NXP Semiconductors NV）周一表示，公司首席执行官库尔特-西弗斯（Kurt Sievers）将于今年年底退休，现任芯片制造商副总裁拉斐尔-索托马约尔（Rafael Sotomayor）将接替他的职位。【原文：NXP Semiconductors NV said on Monday that its CEO Kurt Sievers will retire by the end of the year, and Rafael Sotomayor, currently a Vice President at the chipmaker, will succeed him.】

item.title: 人工智能需求稳定，芯片设计软件制造商 Cadence 上调年度预期
item.description: 凯登斯设计系统公司（Cadence Design Systems）周一上调了对全年营收和利润的预期，看好半导体制造商对其芯片设计软件的强劲需求，这些制造商希望提高产量以利用人工智能的蓬勃发展。【原文：Cadence Design Systems raised its forecasts for annual revenue and profit on Monday, betting on resilient demand for its chip design software from semiconductor makers looking to boost production to capitalize on the AI boom.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局因设备和人员问题推迟飞往纽瓦克机场的航班
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局称，一系列问题导致周一纽瓦克自由机场的交通放缓，促使联合航空公司将至少 35 个航班改飞其他机场。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said a series of issues prompted it to slow traffic at Newark Liberty Airport on Monday, prompting United Airlines to divert at least 35 flights to other airports.】

item.title: Teledyne 首席执行官退休，内部人士鲍勃接任
item.description: 美国防务公司 Teledyne Technologies 周一表示，其首席执行官埃德温-罗克斯（Edwin Roks）已经退休，董事会已任命内部人士乔治-博布（George Bobb）为新任首席执行官，立即生效。【原文：U.S. defense firm Teledyne Technologies said on Monday its CEO Edwin Roks has retired from his position, and the board has appointed insider George Bobb as its new chief executive, effective immediately.】

item.title: 百事可乐公司的佳得乐击败了短跑运动员对 "恢复软糖 "的禁用诉讼
item.description: 百事可乐公司的佳得乐部门周一赢得了对前世界短跑冠军伊萨姆-阿辛加（Issam Asinga）诉讼的驳回，阿辛加将其四年的兴奋剂禁赛归咎于食用了被提高成绩药物污染的 "恢复软糖"。【原文：PepsiCo's Gatorade unit on Monday won the dismissal of a lawsuit by former world champion sprinter Issam Asinga, who blamed his four-year doping ban on eating "recovery gummies" contaminated by a performance-enhancing drug.】

item.title: 数据显示，委内瑞拉老油港附近的油轮在美国许可证到期前排队等候
item.description: 据文件和数据显示，油轮正在委内瑞拉西部地区的一个老油港附近排队装载原油货物，准备在美国规定的 5 月 27 日最后期限前离开这个南美国家，结束运营和出口。【原文：Tankers are lining up near an old oil port at Venezuela's Western region to load crude cargoes and depart from the South American country before a May 27 deadline set by the U.S. to wind down operations and exports, according to documents and data.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行下调 2025 年布伦特原油预期，原因是贸易紧张局势和欧佩克+的转变
item.description: 巴克莱银行周一将 2025 年的布伦特原油预期下调 4 美元，至每桶 70 美元，并将 2026 年的预期定为每桶 62 美元，理由是贸易紧张局势升级以及欧佩克+组织（OPEC+）调整其生产战略，"基本面前路坎坷"。【原文：Barclays lowered its Brent crude forecast on Monday by $4 to $70 a barrel for 2025 and set its 2026 estimate at $62/b, citing "a rocky road ahead for fundamentals" amid escalating trade tensions and OPEC+'s pivot in its production strategy.】

item.title: 保时捷下调全年销量预期
item.description: 德国跑车制造商保时捷周一表示，已将全年销售额预期下调至 370 亿欧元（422.4 亿美元）至 380 亿欧元之间。【原文：German sports car maker Porsche said on Monday it has cut its full-year sales outlook to a range of 37 billion euros ($42.24 billion) to 38 billion euros.】

item.title: 收益率飙升后，美国财政部有望保持稳定的拍卖规模
item.description: 预计美国财政部在本周公布退税计划时，将连续第五个季度保持大部分拍卖规模不变，但投资者将关注任何有关进一步提高拍卖规模的线索，或近期可能下调拍卖规模的可能性。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department is expected to leave most of its auction sizes unchanged for the fifth straight quarter when it announces its refunding plans this week, but investors will focus on any clues about increases further down the road, or on the likelihood of a possible near-term cut.】

item.title: 印度阿达尼绿色公司称对美国起诉的独立审查未发现违规行为
item.description: 印度阿达尼绿色公司（Adani Green）周一表示，该公司对美国起诉公司创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）和阿达尼绿色公司高层管理人员（他们被指控为电力合同行贿 2.65 亿美元）的独立审查没有发现任何违规或违法行为。【原文：India's Adani Green on Monday said that its independent review of the U.S. indictment of founder Gautam Adani and top Adani Green executives, who were accused of paying $265 million in bribes for power contracts, did not identify any non-compliance or irregularities.】

item.title: 司法部官员称，反垄断执法不是监管
item.description: 美国司法部反托拉斯司司长在周一的首次公开演讲中为强有力的反托拉斯执法辩护，称这是防止公司监管的一种方式。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice's antitrust division defended robust antitrust enforcement in her first public speech on Monday, calling it a way to prevent corporate regulation.】

item.title: 特朗普政府允许夏季临时销售高乙醇燃料
item.description: 特朗普政府周一发布了一项紧急豁免，允许今年夏天在全国范围内销售一种高乙醇汽油混合物，称这将增加美国驾车高峰期的燃料供应，并降低成本。【原文：The Trump administration on Monday issued an emergency waiver to allow the sale of a higher-ethanol gasoline blend to be sold this summer nationwide, saying it will add to fuel supply during the peak U.S. driving season and bring down costs.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金首席执行官：市场面临的最大风险是世界变得支离破碎
item.description: 挪威1.8万亿美元主权财富基金的首席执行官告诉路透社，世界经济似乎正在分化，给市场带来了低增长和高通胀，是当前最大的风险。【原文：The world economy appears to be fragmenting, posing the biggest risk to markets currently as it brings low growth and higher inflation, the CEO of Norway's $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund told Reuters.】

item.title: 英国 NCC 集团探索 Escode 业务的战略选择，包括出售
item.description: 总部位于英国的全球网络安全专家 NCC 集团周一表示，正在探索 Escode 业务的各种战略选择，包括可能的出售。【原文：NCC Group , a UK-based global cybersecurity specialist, said on Monday it is exploring various strategic options for its Escode business, including a possible sale.】
